title: Fiskars SoftGrip Titanium Scissors - Contoured Performance All Purpose - 8" Stainless Steel - Straight Paper Scissors for Office, and Arts and Crafts - 3-Count
description: Fiskars Scissors Great for all-purpose cutting in the office and at home, Fiskars Titanium Softgrip Scissors offer improved durability and comfort. These versatile scissors feature titanium-enhanced, stainless steel blades that cut cleanly and stay sharp through heavy use. A straight handle design provides excellent performance on long, running cuts, ergonomically sculpted finger loops provide excellent cutting control, and Softgrip touchpoints help reduce hand fatigue.
